013package org.apache.juneau.soap.annotation;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
017import org.apache.juneau.soap.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
019
020/**
021 * Utility classes and methods for the {@link SoapXmlConfig @SoapXmlConfig} annotation.
022 *
023 * <ul class='seealso'>
024 * </ul>
025 */
026public class SoapXmlConfigAnnotation {
027
028   /**
029    * Applies {@link SoapXmlConfig} annotations to a {@link org.apache.juneau.soap.SoapXmlSerializer.Builder}.
030    */
031   public static class SerializerApply extends AnnotationApplier<SoapXmlConfig,SoapXmlSerializer.Builder> {
032
033      /**
034       * Constructor.
035       *
036       * @param vr The resolver for resolving values in annotations.
037       */
038      public SerializerApply(VarResolverSession vr) {
039         super(SoapXmlConfig.class, SoapXmlSerializer.Builder.class, vr);
040      }
041
042      @Override
043      public void apply(AnnotationInfo<SoapXmlConfig> ai, SoapXmlSerializer.Builder b) {
044         SoapXmlConfig a = ai.inner();
045
046         string(a.soapAction()).ifPresent(x -> b.soapAction(x));
047      }
048   }
049}
